org.biolegato.sequence.canvas.ColourMask

    org.biolegato.sequence.data  

    • Uses of ColourMask in org.biolegato.sequence.canvas

      Fields in org.biolegato.sequence.canvas declared as ColourMask 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      ColourMask SequenceCanvas.DEFAULT_MASK
      The default colour mask for BioLegato.
      Fields in org.biolegato.sequence.canvas with type parameters of type ColourMask 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.List<ColourMask> SequenceCanvas.colourMasks
      The list of all colour masks loaded in the system.
      Methods in org.biolegato.sequence.canvas that return ColourMask 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ColourMask SequenceCanvas.getDefaultMask()
      Load the default colour masks into BioLegato (this was the only way I was able to get the default colour mask to load properly and efficiently).
      static ColourMask ColourMask.readCharMaskFile(java.io.File file)
      Reads and parses a character colour mask file.
      static ColourMask ColourMask.readPosMaskFile(java.io.File file)
      Reads and parses a position colour mask file.

    • Uses of ColourMask in org.biolegato.sequence.data

      Methods in org.biolegato.sequence.data that return ColourMask 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ColourMask Dataset.getMask(int number)
      Retrieves the colour mask object for a given sequence 'line' in the Dataset sequence object container.
